assets.prompt: Minimal vector-like hero illustration for a streaming server landing page. A central hub node with 4-6 flowing lines representing streams going in and out. Clean geometric lines, rounded ends, smooth gradients in cyan/teal + mint + warm amber. Subtle glow, lots of negative space, centered composition. Modern tech aesthetic. Transparent background. No text.
assets.negative_prompt: text, letters, numbers, watermark, logo, frame, photorealistic, noisy, busy, messy, blurry
